art.post: I heard about this on the News and just bought it on Amazon for my 2 daughters and I to read. For all of you that have read it, my oldest daughter just had 2 of her friends within 2 days of each other take their own lives. The boys were both 15 years old. Without going into a long story since I have not read it yet ( just bought it 15 minutes ago) would this book be something I could get for their mothers. I can not wait for my girls and I to read this book. Thank you Jesus!!.
